Course Module Data Visualisation

These visualisations are based on data generated due to interaction with course module section of the platform. They are mainly based on two metrics for each module- total number of students used a module and average percentage of activities visited in a module.

Average Percentage of Activities Visited

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States

Total Number of Students Used Courses

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States
